Elements.Name: RankUI
Description: Displays your current combo rank in the top-right corner of the screen.

Elements.Name: Letterboxing
Description: Plays a short letterbox effect when using Quick Cyloop.

Elements.Name: Announcer
Description: Plays a special voiceline the first time you reach a new Combo Rank in a fight.

Elements.Name: SuperRankUI
Description: Displays your current combo rank in the top-right corner of the screen while using Super Sonic.

Elements.Name: SuperLetterboxing
Description: Plays a short letterbox effect when using Quick Cyloop as Super Sonic.

Elements.Name: SuperAnnouncer
Description: Plays a special voiceline the first time you reach a new Combo Rank in a fight as Super Sonic.
